entry.title: News reporter Jebersan threatened by BJP

link.title: News reporter Jebersan threatened by BJP

entry.content:
Its alarming how religious violence is increasing in Tamilnadu. Even during partition of India, Tamilnadu experienced no Hindu and Muslim violence. We people simply did not know the difference, but now it looks like we must rethink things. There are people who want to polarize us so that they can come to power.

Today there was a news in Polimer channel in which Thanthi T.V news person asks Tamilisai (chief of BJP in Tamilnadu) a question. Tamilisai complains about the rising corruption in the state and how politicians have turned a blind to people and how because of that 2 kids have died due to electrocution due to watter logging because of rains. For that Mr. Jebersan ‘why is BJP so against a movie Mersal, but its not showing that much intensity against corruption?’, unable to answer Tamilisai becomes sentimental and flees the spot.

Then comes the drama. BJP cadres threaten and corner Jebersan, they question him how can he ask such a question. What? Bloody hell, when will this BJP realize they operate in India which is a democracy? And you should be able to answer it. Is there room for dumb people like Tamilisai in India or do we want a leader who can make us understand things well?

By answering Jebersons question, BJP could have unearthed an weakness in it, and could have proceed to fix it, instead they simply want to hide it from the external world by threatening others.

entry.title: I am greater Idiot than Rahul Gandhi, says Narendra Modi

entry.content:

This great idiot is Narendra Modi. I think he said this in IISC in front of scientists who must have got heart attack after hearing this.

I was shocked to hear recently a speech where Modi was disowning GST. We all are now sure that GST though a good idea was a failure in the way it was implemented. Just like demonetization it was a good idea but waste in implementation. GST means tax will become simpler. Many countries have a uniform tax, say you selling an Audi, you charge 7% tax, say you are selling a pack of cigarettes, the tax is still 7%. Though the GST has avoided multiple taxation (by state and center), the implementers were stupid enough to have various tax categories.

Temples and religious institutions have no tax at all I reckon even though they cheat people saying that a thing called god exists, but alcohol which too messes up with mind is taxed nearly 200%. And suddenly when there are state elections, GST rate changes. Damn these fools. Confused, the accounting system in nation is in shambles and none knows how to fix it. Its like Indian re-living the days of Muhammad Bin Tuglak. Now seeing that things have gone worse, Modi is trying to distance himself from the spoils of his governance.

Is this the way a true leader behaves? Shouldn’t a leader have the guts to come out say ‘Yes I have made a mistake, I am sorry, and these are the ways I am planning to fix it’. Isn’t that a mark of a good leader? Why on Earth Modi who wants to project himself as a strong man is behaving like a rat and making fool of himself?

entry.title: Mailsping is evil
entry.content:
I was using mailspring as my mail client for some time, but now I uninstalled it. Mailspring markets itself as a mail client for corporate and like corporates it has evil in its DNA.

As digital freedom progresses, we think that one must not be tracked and ones privacy must be respected, but mailspring thinks the opposite. I was shocked to see when mailspring reported who had opened my mails and when. I called those persons and asked weather they knew that I knew that they had read my mails and they said no. This could mean just one thing, mailspring tracks people even without them knowing. Its evil, pure evil.

People have been made to use mailspring because its convenient, in exchange it compromises their freedom. Thats kind of not acceptable. Instead I would ask people to contribute to mailpile which is hosted here http://mailpile.is . Its not convenient to use, but its surely built with concept of freedom in mind. If enough people contribute, it could become the best Email solution. Or better one can use Thunderbird https://www.mozilla.org/en-US/thunderbird/ with enigmail extension https://www.enigmail.net/index.php/en/ , these will prevent Google and other email providers from tracking you.

entry.title: What I hate about medium
entry.content:
Medium is popular blogging platform, but I moved away from it to Jekyll and Jekyll was good. Let me tell you why I don’t like to blog any more on medium.

Medium wants to track you

Medium loves to track you. It wants to know what your interests are? What you like to read? Who you follow? Are people working in Medium your friends to know these details about you?

Though medium does not force you to login, look at this ugly tool bar at the bottom

Medium reduces your reading area, it forces you to sign in to read so that it knows about you.

You don’t know what they do with your data

Do you really know what Medium does with your data and the behavioral data they collect from you? Do they sell it to others? Share it to NSA? Who knows? This is the major problem we face today using software as service platforms.

Anonymous commenting not possible

Even to comment on ones blog, one needs to login to medium and have a medium account. Thats ridiculous. Commenting means you have more interest on that particular topic, so you can be sold more ads about it. Thats why they want you to login so that they can track about you.

Blog migration is hard

Migrating your blog content away from Medium is hard. Unlike Wordpress you do not have a good migration tool or a tool where you can download all your data.

What happens if you delete your blog?

In medium, none know what happens if you delete your blog or account. Does it really get deleted? Your details are kept by them even if you have deleted your account? Who knows what they are doing without your knowledge?

Conclusion

All these questions have made me to log off medium, I wish you too do the same. Its far far better to have your own server, possibly a wordpress one and blog with it.

entry.title: What can I do if computing prices are falling?

link.title: What can I do if computing prices are falling?

entry.content:
So we got a new client, he wanted to migrate from a previous service provider to us. We have built a web agency thats cutting edge, we have developed automation to such an extent that manual labor is reduced by 90%, and we are aggressively pursuing Artificial Intelligence.

My friend asked how much the infrastructure of the new client will cost, I said a price that would baffle him, it was just 1/400th the price of the previous service provider that had been milking our to be client. My friend flew on a rage, ‘you open source people just think about cost, there are other aspects there is service, value and business angle’ he said.

Then I gave an another quote thats 12 time larger than the previous one and said you can pay and buy beefy machines if you like, none stops you, but for this project this look enough.

The global server prices have fallen. We don’t rely on Amazon, Rackspace, Heroku and stuff like that, we just simply use our own trusted server bank that has enough replication to prevent data loss. To our surprise we found our offering to be faster than Digital ocean.

Digital Ocean is just a startup, which means that it barks and markets a lot than it bites and does real stuff. Something is wrong with their server which take lot of time to respond. And Amazon AWS is far worst, one would never know why it stops or starts all of a sudden and why it lags more. Too much virtualization I suppose.

People who are in the closed source, in the Microsoft camp can’t imagine if something is darn cheap it can be good. They simply lack imagination. Possibly they will value shit more higher than gold if some one can sells it to them at greater price. And people who are in Microsoft, and Apple technological products are doing just that, they are selling shit and are feeling good about it because you have paid a higher price.

Somehow free software people I see are able to look beyond the money and corporate glare, possibly none is trying to make them dumb, or possibly they are more democratic or something. They seem to have more common sense.

entry.title: India is not just two party state

link.title: India is not just two party state

entry.content:
One of my friends tweeted this

If not modi who else, Shall we bring back Manmohan?. I not seeing much difference between congress and BJP other than communal issue

— Jahith Hussain (@jahith) September 27, 2017

It was response to this tweet

Should Narendra Modi continue as Prime minister of #India? | #Politics

— Karthikeyan A K (@karthik_ak) September 27, 2017

I asked blunt to twitter users weather Narendramodi should continue as Indian P.M or not? Its right for a person to vote, its right for a person to change his choice of vote to any candidate or to NOTA at any time I feel.

Many people think about instability. What will happen if one can vote again and again, possibly multiple times a day? Won’t governments change just like that? Yes it will. But isn’t a job of citizen of a democracy to be educated and not bring instability in a nation? Or does a person think its the duty of the government to force stability in a land that it rules? Which do you think is right?

People seem to be having wrong notion, they feel people or nation can decide better if we had limited choices. People feel like there must be a one major ruling party and one minor ruling party, they must keep the nation stable.

I respect their thought. I respect them choosing not to have choice, but now take the case of India, my nation. We have two major parties, one is Congress which is ultra corrupt and another one is relatively less corrupt or good at hiding corruption, its called as Bharathiya Janatha Party.

Lets say that I am a Biz tycoon dealing with billions of dollars a month. How long it would take for me bribe leadership of these two parties? No matter who comes to power, since I control the money I control the law, the flow of information and hence citizens of my nation will think I am good guy all the time unless a miracle happens. One or two might find out what I do, but its easy to eliminate or silence them.

Now lets see how dynamic democracy works and how it will make politicians tremble. In dynamic democracy any one can vote any time, or the voting time period is reduced shortly, say 10 days (I wish it could be 10 minutes). You can cast your vote once in every 10 days and it will be anonymous. Lets say that 10,000 people vote in a village, say if there is more than 6000 votes registered in past 10 days, then the system will count the votes, who ever has majority will be elected and dismissal order will be sent to the person who was on power and if he had lost. Things will be automated.

Dynamic democracy requires two steps, two very independent thing. There will be voting Kisoks all over the country. It will have two independent systems. The first is an access system. It will take in your biometric and check if you unlocked the system in past 10 days. If the system was not unlocked it will order the voting software to take charge. The voting software doesn’t know who you are, it will simply list the candidate and record a vote. Thats it.

The access control software and the voting software shares no data. In fact the voting can be recorded and shred in block chain to make it really transparent. Knowing that one can be evaluated every 10 days will put shivers on politicians spine, will make them obey to people quick rather than to dodge them in a hope that they will forget it during the next voting season.

What will happen because of Dynamic Democracy?

Dynamic democracy is not just voting reform, it should also be the way one stands for election. One should be able to stand as candidate in a place just by clicking few buttons in an app. Why do you think one need to pay the sate or follow formalities for one to be elected? That looks stupid to me.

So any person having the right idea should be able to become candidate, challenge the incumbent in an instant. This way we will have richness, and not just people sticking to two parties. We must not go by party politics, instead we must go by idea politics and elect people who align with our ideas and are passionate about it.

I see no different between parties and cults. I wish people who rule us be independent thinkers and free souls.
